name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Reliability Engineer with a strong foundation in **Instrumentation** and **Root Cause Analysis**, leveraging 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance solutions in various industries. Proven ability to enhance **MTBR** (Mean Time Between Repairs) and effectively implement **Sealing Techniques** to maintain system integrity while adhering to structured working methods.
Demonstrated expertise in thorough **Documentation** and **Inspection Reporting**, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Strong communication skills in **English** enable seamless collaboration with cross-functional teams. Original strengths include hands-on experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by capabilities in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**.
